A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It took a little while to fully grab me\, and there were a couple weird technical flaws you wouldn't normally see in a major studio blockbuster. But 'The Last Jedi' just gets better as it goes along\, raising the stakes constantly\, and pulling rugs out from under the audience left and right. It was so refreshing to watch a film of this scale that wasn't predictable or formulaic. I can't say whether or not I'd want to watch it again\, but I had a total blast seeing it in theaters.
